name: Quince

screenshots.caption: Quince 0.0.2 converting a Hiragana string into HTML/XML entities.

short_description:
Quince is a very simple string converter made using PyQt4 and Python. It is intended to provide a simple way of converting Unicode strings into binary, hexadecimal, HTML, hiragana, and katakana.

DISCLAIMER:
Quince was made purely for personal use, and comes with no claims of stability or reliability whatsoever. It is subject to random breakage, and may not carry all of its tasks out correctly. However, it has been released to the public in the hopes that someone might find it useful.
summary: Converts strings into binary, hexadecimal, HTML, and Japanese kana
